CustomField.description: Calculates the number of days between the created date and the Implementation Call Complete Date. If Implementation call complete date is blank, null is returned.
CustomField.formula:
IF( ISNULL( Implementation_Call_Completed__c ) , Null,
Implementation_Call_Completed__c - datevalue(CreatedDate) - 2*( floor((Implementation_Call_Completed__c - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((datevalue(CreatedDate) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7)))
CustomField.label: Days to Imp Call Completed
